step.title: Introduction
step.content: This document outlines the procedure for replacing a bike fork. It details the necessary steps, precautions, and references to relevant documentation.

list.item: Standard Bike Tools (Wrenches, Allen Keys, etc.)
Reference Documentation (as indicated throughout the procedure)
Ensure the bike is securely positioned on a repair stand or stable surface.
Disconnect any electrical components if applicable.
Remove Front Wheel: Refer to documentation for instructions on front wheel removal.
Remove Front Brakes: Refer to documentation for instructions on front brake removal.
Remove Fork: Refer to documentation for instructions on fork removal.
Change Bike Axis: Refer to documentation for instructions on changing the bike axis.

Install New Fork: Options depend on the specific fork model.
Option 1: Refer to documentation .
Option 2: Refer to documentation .
Install Front Brakes: Refer to documentation for instructions on front brake installation.
Install Front Wheel: Refer to documentation for instructions on front wheel installation.
Fork Installation Test: Refer to documentation to verify proper fork installation.
Front Brakes Test: Refer to documentation to verify proper brake function.

step.title: Closing Remarks
step.content: This procedure provides a general guideline for bike fork replacement. Always consult the manufacturer's specifications and safety guidelines for your specific bike and components. Ensure all connections are secure before operating the bike.
